sentences.en: Do not underrate the difficulty of carrying out this plan.
sentences.cn: 不可低估实行此计画的困难.

sentences.en: I don't underrate the decorative side of life.
sentences.cn: 我并不低估生活中起装饰作用的东西的价值.

sentences.en: Let no man underrate our energies, our potentialities and our abiding power for good.
sentences.cn: 我们决不会让人低估我们除恶向善的活力 、 潜能和力量.

sentences.en: Let your friends underrate your advantage, while let your enemies overrate your disadvantage.
sentences.cn: 让朋友低估你的优点, 让敌人高估你的缺点.

sentences.en: One must not underrate Darlan, nor fail to understand the impulse that moved him.
sentences.cn: 人们不应该低估达尔朗, 同时也不应该不知道推动着他前进的动机.

sentences.en: The further the modernization, the less we can underrate population pressures.
sentences.cn: 越是现代化, 越不能低估人口压力.

sentences.en: There is no duty we so underrate as the duty of being happy.
sentences.cn: 我们最忽略的一种责任,就是快乐.

sentences.en: There is no duty we underrate so much as the duty of being happy.
sentences.cn: 在所有的责任中我们最忽视的是对快乐的追求.

sentences.en: We women have a lot of good business skills, although we tend to underrate ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们女性拥有很多出色的商业技巧，只是我们往往会看轻自己。

sentences.en: You must not underrate the difficulty of climbing this mountain.
sentences.cn: 你不可低估攀登这座山的困难.

trans.tran_en: If you underrate someone or something, you do not recognize how intelligent, important, or significant they are

trans.tran_cn: 对（某人或某事物）评价过低，看轻，轻视
